title: Owned legacy skins do not show in champion bio
body:
I have Tempest Janna skin and I'm able to see and select it in the champion selection screen. However the skin portrait does not show along with the word 'owned' in the screen of champion bio.
I'm on Oceanic server and using a Mac.

replies.body:
Hey IdealThird,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are currently investigating.
